name: The Legend Of micheal
description:
update: mar 1 - bug fixes and QOLs

the evil el gato is being evil and stuff. you must play as micheal and defeat el gato and his minions. (this game is not supposed to be taken seriously)

its mobile friendly too, just press the mobile button

CONTROLS 

A/D - Horizontal Movement

Space - Jump

S - Crouch

W - Fight

Click on inventory items to use/enable them

Click on shop items to buy one of said item

Some objects can be clicked to interact with, e.g. Bingus or Rich Floppa
